sources.title: Vanity of Vanities
sources.description:
Marina Petrovna's husband, Boris Ivanovich, leaves her after nineteen years of marriage. His abandoned wife refuses to grant him a divorce. She doesn't believe his new love is serious. Their eighteen-year-old daughter, Natasha, supports her mother. By chance, Natasha meets a young man, a taxi driver named Vasya, and goes with him to Novgorod to visit his parents. Worried, Marina Petrovna and Boris Ivanovich follow her. Concern for their daughter's fate and the realization of their shared responsibility for her future reunite the couple.

Year of production: 1979

Director: Alla Surikova
Screenwriter: Emil Braginsky
Composer: Bogdan Trotsyuk
Cinematographer: Vsevolod Simakov
Production Designer: Valery Filippov

Cast: Frunzik Mkrtchyan, Galina Polskikh, Leonid Kuravlev, Natalya Krachkovskaya, Lyudmila Ivanova, Borislav Brondukov, Leonid Kharitonov, Anna Varpakhovskaya, Sergey Ivanov, Svetlana Petrosyants (Kolysheva), Yana Poplavskaya

metadata.Plot: A provincial town's love story with humor, miracles and national flavor.
metadata.Actors: Grigoriy Kaganovich, Igor Pekhovich, Grigoriy Perel
